## ErrorX.configure() method

Configure global ErrorX settings. This method allows you to set defaults for all ErrorX instances.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static configure(config: ErrorXConfig): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

config


</td><td>

[ErrorXConfig](./error-x.errorxconfig.md)


</td><td>

Configuration object


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```typescript
ErrorX.configure({
  source: 'my-api-service',
  docsBaseURL: 'https://docs.example.com/errors',
  docsMap: {
    'AUTH_FAILED': 'authentication-errors',
    'DB_ERROR': 'database-errors'
  },
  cleanStackDelimiter: 'app-entry-point' // Trim stack traces after this line
})
```
